rows.label: qst100506_msg0002
rows.name:
Do you remember me, perhaps?
It's Alisdeigh. That business with the
ancient Nopon murals?

rows.label: qst100506_msg0003
rows.name:
Since you got that key, I've been
looking at the other evidence of the
ancient Nopon in this place.

rows.label: qst100506_msg0004
rows.name:
You know...whether the hero's treasure
from the mural actually existed or not...

rows.label: qst100506_msg0005
rows.name: But it seems you've just found it!

rows.label: qst100506_msg0006
rows.name: So how did you get here?

rows.label: qst100506_msg0007
rows.name: That key? In the door of Avaritia?

rows.label: qst100506_msg0008
rows.name:
Ah, of course... I had heard that there
used to be a Nopon base of activities
here in the ancient period, yes...

rows.label: qst100506_msg0009
rows.name:
So no wonder that would be where
the answer is to be found!

rows.label: qst100506_msg0010
rows.name:
Anyhow, what was this treasure that
you found?

rows.label: qst100506_msg0012
rows.name:
This is the logbook of the legendary
pirate, Captain Nopopon!

rows.label: qst100506_msg0013
rows.name:
Of course, I'm anxious to see what it
contains... But may I ask, were you sent
here by someone else, perhaps?

rows.label: qst100506_msg0014
rows.name:
It wouldn't benefit me to stick
my nose into incomplete research.

rows.label: qst100506_msg0015
rows.name:
I really think I ought to just wait for
the study to be published.
